tool_description: An app to provide PNG files of words, spelled out in American Sign Language. Note this API may be slow, 10-20 seconds per request, because it's on a free hosting plan.
name: American Sign Language Spelling Tool
title: American Sign Language Spelling Tool

api_list.name: Word generator
api_list.description: Responds with a PNG image of the requested word, spelled out in the American Sign Language alphabet.

optional_parameters.name: scale
optional_parameters.description: A decimal or integer that is greater than zero, and less than or equal to five.

api_list.name: Default endpoint
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://american-sign-language-spelling-tool.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "american-sign-language-spelling-tool.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://american-sign-language-spelling-tool.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "american-sign-language-spelling-tool.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
